overview: A young man is confined in a mental hospital. Through a flashback we see that he was traumatized as a child, when he and his family were circus performers. Back in the present, he escapes and rejoins his surviving and armless mother.
tagline: Forget Everything You Have Ever Seen.
cast: Axel Jodorowsky|Blanca Guerra|Guy Stockwell|Thelma Tixou|Sabrina Dennison
